g.text: US007 - As Director, I want to associate a human resource (user) to a project
Asks to associate a human resource (user) to a project
Types data (email, projectCode, startDate, endDate, costPerHour, percentageOfAllocation)
associateResource (email, projectCode, startDate, endDate, costPerHour, percentageOfAllocation)
[for each known system user in systemUserList]
